name: Time's Legacy
description:
Check out our Tumblr! : Here

Premise

Long ago, the gods gifted four heroes divine artifacts to protect humanity-- with the catch that only those of the heroes’ bloodlines could use the artifacts. They hold great power, but come at an even greater cost.

You take the part of the Heir, child of King Leofric and successor to the Artifact of Time, a watch that allows you to reverse time. Life was good, life was peaceful... until now. 

Features

  • Customizable PC (Gender, looks, personality, etc.) 
  • A quest to save humanity-- or destroy it. 
  • Form relationships with your companions-- and maybe even find love in the process. 
  • Lore-rich story and background, get to know the world you inhibit! 

Romance Options

Muzai/Maza - Portrait - The bastard. Who said mages always had to be wise and knowledgeable? M is snarky, rude, and impulsive-- but they sure do know their way around a spell. 

Cihrue Novikov/Cihre Novikova - Portrait -  Mysterious, aloof-- even a bit cold. They agreed to help on your quest, though seem to have their own motives beyond preventing the destruction of humanity. 

Eilert/Eira Engel - Portrait - Ruler of Loutha. Duty-bound, honorable, and a damned good fighter. They are the last surviving member of the Engel bloodline, a fact that brings them great pain to discuss. 

Tenebrosus - A name of legends... that is about all you know so far.
